name: Nakajima Satoru Kanshū F1 Super License
name_original: Nakajima Satoru Kanshū F1 Super License
description: Nakajima Satoru Kanshū F1 Super License (中嶋悟監修 Ｆ１ スーパーライセンス) is a 1992 racing video game for the Sega Mega Drive that allows for either single season or exhibition modes of play. The object of the game is to acquire the championship for the 1992 Formula One season. There is an official FOCA license and uses a top-down view.
